pageProduct.name: Organic Formulations Sensitive Conditioner 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Sensitive Conditioner perfect for sensitive scalp and skin

Common Uses

For Sensitive Scalp and Skin

Ingredients

Ingredients: Aqua, Guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, P-Anisic acid, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetyl Alcohol, Organic Coconut Oil (Coco nucifera)*, Organic Sunflower Oil (Helianthus annuss)*, Organic Avocado Oil (Persea gratissima)*, Organic Wheatgerm oil (Triticum vulgare)*, Organic Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia chinesis)*, Organic Apricot Kernal Oil (Prunus armeniaca)*, Organic Argan Oil (Argania spinosa)*, Sweet Almond oil (Prunus dulcis), Organic Aloe vera juice (Aloe barbadensis)*, Tocopherol, Parfum (Natural preservative) From Organic Agriculture* 23% Organic of Total 100% Natural Origin of total

Directions

Wet hair. Massage conditioner into the hair concentrating on the ends. Leave for 3 minutes then rinse thoroughly. Perfect for everyday use if required.
